name: Meltdown!!
description:
This is a Sokoban-esque game that I made for Ludum Dare 49. This game was made without the use of any engines or frameworks. Instead, I wrote the game in C++ and OpenGL, and I used SDL2 for window creation and input handling. The game is supposed to take place in a nuclear reactor of sorts, but I ran out of time to add any graphics that resemble such a setting unfortunately.

Description

A Nuclear Reactor has gone haywire! You'll need to navigate your way to every unstable core in this turn-based puzzle game to prevent a meltdown from happening! Twist and turn the level around, and push and pull blocks to shape a way to each nuclear core before your turns run out!

Controls

A - Move Left
D - Move Right
Q - Rotate Counterclockwise
E - Rotate Clockwise
Space - Attach magnet to metal block (you need to first press up against the block with A or D)
